channel.title: Need help with a server
channel.description: hey guys me and my friends are trying to make a server where only we can play on we arent gonna host it or anything but i need help getting a client for their side. my server seems to be running and the local client runs and the game is perfect i just need help changing the ip for the client so that my buds can play on it too. also i need help with making us all owners. sorry im new to this thanks :) also u can add me on skype if you need just ask greatly appreciated

item.title: Need help with a server
item.dc:creator: @Devinhdl Devinhdl
item.description:
@Devinhdl wrote:

If it’s just your friends and you trust them, you could probably just use your ipv4 address but to be secure just use your no-ip one… Don’t forget to compile and make sure your port is open

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with a server
item.dc:creator: @nazzy_nazdel nazzy nazdel
item.description:
@nazzy_nazdel wrote:

i know i have to do that but i need to know exactly which ips it never works whenever i change whatever ip

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with a server
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

Just change the IP in your server files after setting up no-ip. Send them the client and rank them.

Read full topic
